div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Feb. 22, 1867. THE MOEGLING SOCIETY

body.p: Yesterday the treasurer received the following contributions: Chicago Turngemeinde, $100; [names of smaller contributors, fifty-one in number, omitted in translation]; total, $323.75. Previously acknowledged, $512; grand total $835.75. Collectors are requested to report to our office every afternoon before five o'clock. [Translator's note: This money was being collected for the relief of the sick and destitute German patriot, Theodor Moegling.]
